  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_529</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_529</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Seccionando el cono</string>
            <string language="en">Sections of the cone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel des Kegels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sections du cône</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seções do cone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezioni del cono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τμήματα του κώνου</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las curvas cónicas. La presentación de las cónicas se hace desde un punto de vista sintético, utilizando las intersecciones entre planos y cono de revolución para su definición y las esferas de Dandelin.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching which uses simulations to explain conic sections from a synthetic point of view, using the plane sections of a conic surface and Dandelin spheres to define the curves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cónicas</string>
            <string language="en">conic sections</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">hipérbola</string>
            <string language="en">hyperbola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parábola</string>
            <string language="en">parabola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">elipse</string>
            <string language="en">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">curvas</string>
            <string language="en">curves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">welchem Gebrauch Simulationen unterrichten, 
Kegelschnitte von einem synthetischen Gesichtspunkt mit den flachen 
Kapiteln einer konischen Oberfläche und der Dandelin Bereiche zu 
erklären, die Kurven zu definieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignant à quelles utilisations des simulations
d'expliquer les sections coniques d'un point de vue synthétique, en 
utilisant les sections plates d'une surface conique et des sphères de
Dandelin pour définir les courbes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensinando a que usos simulações explicar 
seções cónicas de um ponto sintético da vista, usando as seções 
planas de uma superfície cónica e de esferas de Dandelin definir as 
curvas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnando a quali usi le simulazioni spiegare le 
sezioni conic da un punto di vista sintetico, usando le sezioni piane 
di una superficie conic e delle sfere di Dandelin per definire le 
curve.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδασκαλικός ποιες προσομοιώσεις χρήσεων για να 
εξηγήσει τα κωνικά τμήματα από συνθετική άποψη, που 
χρησιμοποιεί τα τμήματα αεροπλάνων μιας κωνικής επιφάνειας και 
των σφαιρών Dandelin για να καθορίσει τις καμπύλες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kegelschnitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hyperbel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parabel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurven</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sections coniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hyperbole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">parabole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seções cónicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hyperbola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
